column4: [Ubuntu 9.04] What file stores the names of programs to start automaticallly after a computer cold start?
I hhave a prog called startup manager on xubuntu
its on the system tab on the menu button thingy

I do not use Xubuntu but Ubuntu with GNOME. System > Preferences > Startup Applications shows a list titled "Additional startup programs". This does not list 'Pidgin'. But Pidgin started automatically. May be I can solve my problem by deasserting the "Automatically remember running applications when logging out" button. --  Thank you for your comment.
